title: WTf is wrong with minions?
body: These bloody nut heads change their fken target for no reason. Catty be attacking one melee minion for 1sec and then changing their focus to another when the one they were attacking hasnt even died yet. Fken making me miss cs. These bloody minions

replies.body:
Yeh. minions are not great. never have been. I think the guy that coded them must have left and no one wants to touch them in case they break them.

They switch focus for no reason, run into tower range for no reason and also, minion block is horse shit.
